title: Fix registration flow and admin member removal

requirements.text: Fix the registration flow so that newly registered users are immediately granted access to the main app without any approval gate or waiting screen. After completing profile setup, users must be routed directly to the main application.
acceptanceCriteria: A new user who completes the signup and profile setup flow is immediately taken to the main app
No approval waiting screen or gate is shown after registration
The user's status in the backend is set to approved upon registration
Refreshing the page after registration does not redirect the user back to a waiting or approval screen

requirements.text: Fix the admin member removal feature so that admins can successfully remove members from the Members tab in the Admin panel. The remove action must call the correct backend function, handle errors gracefully, and reflect the updated member list immediately after removal.
acceptanceCriteria: A 'Remove Member' action is visible and functional in the admin Members tab for eligible users
Clicking remove triggers a confirmation prompt before proceeding
The backend successfully removes the user and returns a success result
The member list updates immediately after a successful removal without requiring a full page reload
An appropriate error message is shown if the removal fails

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui
Preserve existing role-based access control logic
Keep all backend logic in the single main actor at backend/main.mo
nonGoals: Redesigning the authentication UI or layout
Adding new admin features beyond member removal
Changing the existing approval flow for posts or events
